author: UltPanda
install_msg: Thank you for installing the Demon Slayer cog! Get ready to slay some demons and master your breathing techniques. Use `[p]help ds` to see all available commands.
name: DemonSlayer
short: A Demon Slayer themed cog with interactive commands.
description: This cog brings the world of Demon Slayer to your Discord server. Assign breathing techniques, slay demons, train, and rise through the ranks of the Demon Slayer Corps!
end_user_data_statement: This cog stores user data including assigned breathing techniques, Nichirin blade colors, number of demons slayed, and current rank. Users can delete their data at any time.
